section.title: Introduction
section.p: Card properties are custom attributes that you can define and then apply to a card type, they are analogous to custom fields. Card properties can be applied to one or more card types, and can have their allowable set of values restricted in a number of ways. You can choose whether or not to show or hide properties (so they're visible/invisible on cards), and lock or unlock properties (so that only project administrators can add or change property values).
section.hint: If you created a new project based on a template, the project will include some card properties by default. You can update or remove any extra card properties as required.
